name: System Goals
description: A taxonomy of high-level, domain-facing goals and use cases that an AI / Machine system may tackle during its operation

children.name: Financial and Market-related Goals
children.description: General computational processing goals that do not necessarily involve the usage of AI and ML.

children.name: Financial Processing
children.description: Goals geared towards the estimation of financial quantities.

children.name: Market Forecasting
children.description: The class of goals that generate quantitative estimates of market quantities (e.g. traffic, demand, etc.)

children.name: Automatic Stock Trading
children.description: The goal of automatically valuing and performing transactions in the stock market.

children.name: Scheduling
children.description: The goal of planning and constructing schedules for optimizing desired quantities (e.g. throughput, revenue, clicks) given existing constaints

children.name: Automatic Skill Assessment
children.description: The goal of estimating employee skills automatically.

children.name: Behavioral Modeling
children.description: The goal of modeling, estimating and tracking human behaviour in domains of interest.

children.name: Recidivism Prediction
children.description: The goal of producing recidivism risk estimates for incarcerated population.

children.name: Activity Tracking
children.description: The goal of tracking and monitoring of human activities via smart equipment, wearables, etc.

children.name: Object Detection
children.description: The goal of locating objects of interest in an input receptive field.

children.name: Audio Detection
children.description: Goals including detection of auditory concepts in an audio signal.

children.name: Gunshot Detection
children.description: The goal of detecting gunshot sounds.

children.name: Audio Localization
children.description: The goal of determining the source location of audio signals.

children.name: Substance Detection
children.description: Goals related to detecting chemical substances with the use of specialized sensors.

children.name: License Plate Recognition
children.description: The goal of automatically reading cat license plates.

children.name: Information Retrieval
children.description: The goal of selecting relevant data instances from an available pool of candidates.

children.name: Content Recommendation
children.description: Automatic retrieval and serving of content to a user based on their profile, activity and/or history.

children.name: Content Search
children.description: Automatic retrieval and serving of content to a user based on an explicitly supplied query.

children.name: Data Grouping
children.description: The goal of building groups of semantically contiguous elements.

children.name: Natural Language Processing / Understanding Goals
children.description: Goals involving the intelligent processing, reasoning and manipulation of text

children.name: Translation
children.description: Automatic translation of text from a source to a target language.

children.name: Question Answering
children.description: The goal of automatically providing relevant and accurate responses to questions.

children.name: Chatbot
children.description: The goal of an NLP / AI engaging in dialogue and conversation.

children.name: Computer Vision Goals
children.description: System goals related to analysis and manipulation on the visual modalities

children.name: Image Cropping
children.description: The selection of an image subset that contains the most salient content.

children.name: Image Tagging
children.description: The goal of attaching semantic label to an image based on its content..

children.name: Face Recognition
children.description: The goal of automatically recognizing a human face in media content, out of a set of reference candidates.

children.name: Threat Detection
children.description: Goals dealing with visual inspection of the earth via satellite imaging.

children.name: Smart Devices
children.description: Goals that include usage of AI technology for automation, interconnected devices, IoT, 'smart' living, etc..

children.name: AI Voice Assistant
children.description: The usage of AI for automated voice assistance functionality.

children.name: Synthetic Content Generation
children.description: Goals that generate high-quality content via automatic means

children.name: Code Generation
children.description: The automatic generation and suggestion of large code snippets from current code context.

children.name: Social Media Content Generation
children.description: The automatic generation of social media text (e.g. posts, comments, etc.) from a seed prompt.

children.name: Deepfake Video Generation
children.description: The automatic generation of videos that imitate the face, voice and mannerisms of individuals.

children.name: Visual Art Generation
children.description: The automatic generation of digital art images.

children.name: Automated Content Curation
children.description: Goals that estimate how suitable / appropriate content is for the target domain, audience or context

children.name: Hate Speech Detection
children.description: The detection of hateful language (e.g. chauvinism / discrimination against race, religion, gender, etc.) in text.

children.name: NSFW Content Detection
children.description: The goal of gauging whether text or multimedia content is safe for work or not (e.g. graphic, violent, adult content)

children.name: Copyrighted Content Detection
children.description: The goal of detecting / identifying the presence of copyrighted content elements in input data.

children.name: Robotics and Autonomous Systems
children.description: Goals involving robotic actuators and/or autonomous robots

children.name: Robotic Manipulation
children.description: The goal of manipulating physical objects via robotic actuators (e.g. arms, industrial robots, etc.)

children.name: Autonomous Drones
children.description: Goals involving autonomous drone robots (e.g. such as Boston Dynamics robots)

children.name: Autonomous Driving
children.description: The goal of autonomous, driverless vehicle operation.
